tooltip.ktmresource.press_shift: Hold SHIFT to see more info
tooltip.ktmresource.lost_fragment: The long lost fragment of memories, maybe there are some information that can be used
tooltip.ktmresource.lost_note: After assembling fragments of memories, you shall find steps to guide you along the way
tooltip.ktmresource.lost_record: With the words of magic mapped on it, a forbidden combination of large amount of memory fragments is created
tooltip.ktmresource.reroll_orb: Has the power to reset someone's origin, but in great cost
tooltip.ktmresource.astral_energy: Pure cosmic force contained in a small orb
tooltip.ktmresource.alien_heart: Mystic matter that does not apply to the law of this world
tooltip.ktmresource.astral_heart: Mystic matter that resonate with the stars
tooltip.ktmresource.holy_heart: Mystic matter with overflowing divine power
tooltip.ktmresource.nether_heart: Born from nether, and inherited its power within
tooltip.ktmresource.starforged_heart: Mysterious substance of an unknown origin, possibly related to the cosmic
tooltip.ktmresource.uncommon_repairkit: Repair kit for Uncommon Tier items
tooltip.ktmresource.advanced_repairkit: Repair kit for Advanced Tier items
tooltip.ktmresource.alien_repairkit: Repair kit for Master Tier items, somehow it emits blue radiance
tooltip.ktmresource.ender_repairkit: Repair kit for Epic Tier items, somehow it emits purple radiance
tooltip.ktmresource.energized_repairkit: Repair kit for Matrix Tier items, somehow it glows radioactive radiance
tooltip.ktmresource.legendary_repairkit: Repair kit for Legendary Tier items, somehow it emits orange radiance
tooltip.ktmresource.mythic_repairkit: Repair kit for Mythic Tier items, somehow it emits red radiance
tooltip.ktmresource.bloodstone: A suspicious stone that has a certain connection to the hidden vampire clan
tooltip.ktmresource.eternal_stone: This stone has supreme affinity to weapons, tools and armors
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofadventurer: This token has a touch of the Golden Dominance
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofanotheradven: This token has imbued the power of Golden Dominance
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofanothersunke: This token holds the strong will of the voyagers
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofcopper: A low-tier currency used on the land of Erdas
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofender: The quintessential power of The End is radiating from this token
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofgold: A high-tier currency used on the land of Erdas
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofnether: This token exudes the quintessential power of the Blazing Land
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofplatinum: A high-tier currency used on the land of Erdas
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofsilver: A mid-tier currency used on the land of Erdas
tooltip.ktmresource.token_ofsunkensoul: This token bears the faint wish of the voyagers
desc.ktmresource.vanilla_scythes: Compare to swords, scythes can attack more enemies at once
desc.ktmresource.vanilla_tangswords: Very sharp weapon with unique armor piercing ability
desc.ktmresource.vanilla_curvedswords: Improved greatsword weapon that is easier to wield
desc.ktmresource.advanced_weapons: 「A well made weapon suitable for battle」
desc.ktmresource.elite_weapons: 「An advanced weapon worthy of an elite adventurer」
desc.ktmresource.custom_weapons: 「High quality artwork emerged from elaborate smithing technique」
desc.ktmresource.unique_weapons: 「A refined weapon that is difficult to obtain」
desc.ktmresource.exotic_weapons: 「A high level weapon that is extraordinarily rare」
desc.ktmresource.another_weapons: 「A weapon that does not belong to this world」
desc.ktmresource.legendary_weapons: 「This weapon thirsts for the blood of the mighty one...」
desc.ktmresource.ingot_mythic: An extremely rare ingot that only appears in myth...
desc.ktmresource.curvedsword_of_afterlif: ——Built by a famous weapon smith from a mysterious country in the east, the carved Yin Yang rune makes this sword capable of absorbing the essence of heaven and earth
desc.ktmresource.dainsleif: ——The demon sword Dainsleif, and the demon sword Mistilteinn are twin swords. They represent outer and inner power, yet the rift between dimensions maintains their coexistence
desc.ktmresource.mistilteinn: ————The demon sword Mistilteinn, and the demon sword Dainsleif are twin swords. They represent outer and inner power, yet the rift between dimensions maintains their coexistence
desc.ktmresource.ama_no_murakumo: ——Ama no Murakumo is a divine sword, but it is also a demon sword. According to the legend, it is derived from the remains of the Yamata no Orochi. There are all sorts of unsolved mysteries about this weapon...
desc.ktmresource.laevateinn: ——This demon sword is blessed by the fire spirit and is only after being recognized by the sword can you be qualified to use it. Laevateinn contains a powerful infernal flame, and the consequences will be unimaginable if all of them are released
desc.ktmresource.powered_scythe: ——This sickle that has been infused with energy can easily cut through enemies, a fine collection for every sickle wielder
desc.ktmresource.aquaslashkai_a: ——Pure magic resonation. The longing that the twin sisters could not convey from generation to generation can only be turned into a gleam of sorrow on the crystal...
desc.ktmresource.aquaslashkai_b: ——Pure magic resonation. The longing that the twin sisters could not convey from generation to generation can only be turned into a gleam of sorrow on the crystal...
desc.ktmresource.rusty_halberd: ——Even if the weapon is stained and rusted, the soldiers are still riding like a thousand; how can the yearning from friends be passed on to those who are dying...
desc.ktmresource.runesakura_tachi: ——It was just an ordinary sword, but was reborn with the blessing of Onmyojutsu, the rune words on it have profound meanings. This sword seems to be different in grip
desc.ktmresource.lunarcrystal_greatsword: ——A symbol of purity and immaculateness. This great sword should came from the summoning ceremony of the Moonlight Spirit, and now it can be forged as an advanced imitation
desc.ktmresource.kalioth_sword: ——The sword of honor bestowed upon the knights of Kalioth, these knights represent absolute loyalty, even after death, they become undead to guard their masters' legacy
desc.ktmresource.soul_harvester: ——The magical sickle that has been consecrated by the soul, even if it is composed of undead souls, there isn't any sense of the evil energy within it...
desc.ktmresource.excalibur_kai: ——The replica of the Excalibur is by the feat of technology and sorcery. To some extent this replica overpowers its origin, but its potential has not yet been fully tapped
desc.ktmresource.bloodthirst_dagger: ——A metal knife that gnaws at the flesh of the enemy. The magical substance attached to it makes this weapon oddly light in weight, which results only swifty users can unleash its potential
desc.ktmresource.unmovable_dawnlight: ——「You can call me Unmovable dawnlight」 ——a peculiar shaped long sword that synchronizes with the user's soul. It is said that when the sword breaks, the sword owner will lose consciousness
desc.ktmresource.maniacal_dusk: ——「The sunless dusk declares your death」——a seemingly cumbersome weapon, in the hands of 'The Slaughterer' is a killing blade that combines agility and damage, its edge reveals a ruthless cold light
desc.ktmresource.black_sword: ——As a prototype of an unknown weapon, this sword has very stable stats. It is worth noting that due to the special material it is made of, the handle of this sword is thicker than any other common swords
desc.ktmresource.blue_longsword: ——This longsword is not pure blue, its name comes from the rare sapphire gem in the center. The blade is forged from a diamond-like material, which makes the sword surprisingly tough
desc.ktmresource.anneal_blade: ——A decent one-handed heirloom sword of a certain knight family. However, because of this simplicity, its truly commendable texture is easily overlooked
desc.ktmresource.bluerose_sword: ——Born from the end of the uninhabited ice, the cold light from the blade tells the story of loneliness, while the blue rose on the hand guard symbolizes nobility and purity
desc.ktmresource.blackiron_greatsword: ——A great-sword forged for power type warriors. Due to specialized demand, it is relatively rare in the market. The sword blade is plated with some kind of black metal, pretty ordinary in terms of ability
desc.ktmresource.thebladeofgolden: ——「Your brave is blade cuts night, breaks dawn! Your words is sword save the world, shows crown!」
desc.ktmresource.fragrant_olivesword: ——A delicate and beautiful golden sword, its blade shines with the light of glory. It is said that it was born from a sacred fragrant olive tree in the Stellar era, and acquired the attribute of eternal immortality after being transformed into a weapon
desc.ktmresource.elucidator: ——The pitch-black blade material, unparalleled hardness, and extraordinary texture makes it an absolute top-class weapon. This sword is an ultra-rare drop item, which requires higher stats to equip
desc.ktmresource.dark_repulser: ——Forged from an extremely rare crystal, the blade is incredibly light and thin for a single-handed sword
desc.ktmresource.demonicsword_gram: ——A crimson-red two-handed demon sword, the equipment level is unimaginable high. It is named after the dragon-slaying sword in Norse mythology
desc.ktmresource.ebon_dagger: ——A dark dagger with a hilt made of a special wood blend. Popular among travelers due to its lightness
desc.ktmresource.lambent_light: ——A masterpiece of rapier weapons, made for agile type users. Due to this weapon is hand forged, its hidden rarity surpasses any other rapier weapons
desc.ktmresource.bladeof_greed: ——A tough giant sword built by the goblin army for the orc slaves. No man could easily wield this sword, unless he has reached to another level
desc.ktmresource.frost_piercer: ——A halberd weapon full of frost essence, the body of it is loaded with elements of technology. Due to the precise construction of this masterpiece, a well-developed blueprint for forging is essential
desc.ktmresource.claudias_crystalgreatsw: ——This greatsword is the relic of a female knight in the distant past, and it was left on this land without being buried. According to records, the gems and runes on the blade allow the user to communicate with the moon spirit
desc.ktmresource.faringstar_blade: ——One of the masterpieces of the legendary swordsman Oreton, if anyone doubts the great achievements of the Cosmic Era, then the power of the stars that remains on this sword is the best proof. 「May people never forget that history...」
desc.ktmresource.razor_edge: ——An ancient treasury weapon from a perished kingdom. It is said that the blade is so sharp that it could slice through armor like paper. Since the sword was not created using forging techniques from Erdas, no one knows whether it is a magically enchanted weapon or not...
desc.ktmresource.shadowof_yggdrasil: ——The name of the weapon tells that it was once a branch of the sacred tree Yggdrasil. This staff not only has the power to channel and focus magic power, but its extraordinary weight also makes it easy to break human skulls
desc.ktmresource.spuit_lance: ——A divine-class weapon created by the Supreme Being, it is a long spear with a rather peculiar shape. It will return a portion of the damage dealt to heal the wielder. Facing the enemy with this weapon, tremble, for you will face true horror...
desc.ktmresource.armageddon: ——The sword of judgment wielded by the king of the Winged Spirit who ruled radiance in the past, blue fire ripples shines around the blade. Activate by an ancient device to restore its power back in the days. Getting struck by this sword will apply severe negative effects
desc.ktmresource.kisaras_devilsword:
——One of the exorcism weapons, actually from an unknown realm. The shape and material of this sword are so bizarre, that it doesn't even look like it came from human hands? ...
§c「The Lost Chapter·Memories」
desc.ktmresource.kannas_devilspear:
——One of the exorcism weapons, actually from an unknown realm. The body of this spear emits a faint and strange blue light, that it doesn't even look like it came from human hands? ...
§b「The Lost Chapter·Sealed」
desc.ktmresource.hf_muramasa:
——The treasured sword that has been passed down from generation to generation, inherits the user's will to fight, which makes the value of this sword go to a higher level
§4「The only thing I know for real! There will be blood! Shed!」
desc.ktmresource.tohkas_sandalphon:
——A mysterious greatsword in the throne, it was summoned by an unknown force. The secret power of this sword can only be exerted by the true owner of this sword
§d「Adonai Melek·Princess」
